00098 //---- Constant definitions ----
00099 #define CSTORAGE_MAX_FNAME_LENGTH 256
00100 #define CSTORAGE_STATISTICS
00101 #define CSTORAGE_STATISTICS_MAXVALUE (MAXLONG - 100)
00102 
00103 //==============================================================================
00104 // Class CStorage definitions.
00105 //==============================================================================
00137 class CStorage // Naming: csto
00138 {
00139    public:
00143       CStorage();
00144 
00148       ~CStorage();
00149 
00157       void Open(const char *fName);
00158 
00162       void Close();
00163 
00182       void Create(const char *fName, int pageSize, int userHeaderSize,
00183                   int cacheNPages = 100);
00184 
00188       bool IsOpened(){
00189          return (fd >= 0);
00190       }//end IsOpened
00191 
00196       void Drop();
00197 
00202       long GetFileSize(){
00203          return lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_END);
00204       }//end GetFileSize
00205 
00206       /*
00207       * Reads user header.
00208       *
00209       * @warning This operation don't use the cache.
00210       */
00211       void ReadUserHeader(void *page);
00212 
00216       long GetUserHeaderSize();
00217 
00223       void WriteUserHeader(void *page);
00224 
00231       void ReadPage(long pageId, void *page);
00232 
00239       void WritePage(long pageId, void *page);
00240 
00246       long InsertNewPage(void *page);
00247 
00253       void FreePage(long pageId);
00254 
00258       void FlushCache(){
00259          cache.FlushCache();
00260       }//end FlushCache
00261 
00265       int GetCacheTotalPages(){
00266          return fileHeader.cacheTotalPages;
00267       }//end GetCacheTotalPages
00268 
00275       void ResizeCache(int newCacheNPages);
00276 
00280       int GetPageSize(){
00281          return fileHeader.pageSize;
00282       }//end GetPageSize
00283 
00287       long GetTotalPagesInUse(){
00288          return fileHeader.totalPagesInUse;
00289       }//end GetTotalPagesInUse
00290 
00294       long GetTotalPagesIncludingDisposed(){
00295          return fileHeader.totalPagesInUse + fileHeader.totalPagesInDisposeList;
00296       }//end GetTotalPagesIncludingDisposed
00297 
00298       //---------------------------------------------
00299       // Statistics Related - When activated.
00300       //---------------------------------------------
00301       #ifdef CSTORAGE_STATISTICS
00302       
00306       struct statisticsCounters {
00307 
00311          long headerRead;
00312 
00316          long headerWrite;
00317 
00321          long pageRead;
00322 
00326          long pageWrite;
00327 
00331          long newPage;
00332         
00336          long totalPageAccess; // 
00337         
00346          long diskRead;
00347 
00356          long diskWrite;
00357       };
00358       
00362       statisticsCounters counters;
00363 
00367       statisticsCounters & GetStatistics() {
00368          counters.totalPageAccess = counters.pageRead + counters.pageWrite;
00369 
00370          return counters;
00371       }//end GetStatistics
00372 
00376       void ResetStatistics() {
00377          counters.headerRead =
00378          counters.headerWrite =
00379          counters.pageRead =
00380          counters.pageWrite =
00381          counters.newPage =
00382          counters.totalPageAccess =
00383          counters.diskRead =
00384          counters.diskWrite = 0;
00385       }//end ResetStatistics
00386       #endif
00387 
00388    private:
00389       //---------------------------------------------
00390       // Constants and types.
00391       //---------------------------------------------
00392       #define FROT 4  // 16 records per block - cache attribute
00393 
00394       struct tFileHeader {
00395          int pageSize; // size of each page - defined in creation time
00396          int cacheTotalPages; // number of pages in cache
00397          long totalPagesInUse; // total number of valid pages
00398          long disposeList; // lists of the disposed records
00399          long totalPagesInDisposeList; // total number of disposed pages
00400          long userHeaderSize; // size of the user's header
00401       };//end tFileHeader
00402       #define CSTORAGE_HEADERSIZE sizeof(tFileHeader)
00403 
00407       char fileName[CSTORAGE_MAX_FNAME_LENGTH];
00408 
00412       int  fd;
00413 
00417       tFileHeader fileHeader;
00418     
00422       long firstPageDiskAddress;
00423     
00427       CNSCache<CStorage> cache;
00428 
00429       friend class CNSCache<CStorage>;
00430 
00434       void ReadHeader(){
00435          lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00436          read(fd, &fileHeader, CSTORAGE_HEADERSIZE);
00437       }//end ReadHeader
00438 
00442       void WriteHeader(){
00443          lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00444          write(fd, &fileHeader, CSTORAGE_HEADERSIZE);
00445       }//end WriteHeader
00446 
00451       void CalcFirstPageDiskAddress();
00452 
00458       long ToPageId(long fileCursor){
00459          return ((fileCursor - firstPageDiskAddress) / fileHeader.pageSize);
00460       }//end ToPageId
00461 
00467       long ToFileCursor(long pageId){
00468          return (firstPageDiskAddress + (pageId * fileHeader.pageSize));
00469       }//end ToFileCursor
00470 
00474       void InitializeCache(){
00475          cache.MountCache(this, GetTotalPagesIncludingDisposed(),
00476                        FROT, fileHeader.cacheTotalPages, fileHeader.pageSize);
00477       }//end InitializeCache
00478 
00485       void DiskReadPage(long pageId, void *page);
00486 
00493       void DiskWritePage(long pageId, void *page);
00494 
00498       void Reset();
00499       
00500 };//end CStorage
